subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer’s 25-footer gave the United States a 4 ½-3 ½ lead after the first day of the Solheim Cup, and made Juli Inkster the highest-scoring American player in the event’s history.
snippet: Paula Creamer’s 25-footer gave the United States a 4 ½-3 ½ lead after the first day of the Solheim Cup, and made Juli Inkster the highest-scoring American player in the event’s history.
